changeSet.author: settler
changeSet.createView: SELECT s.id, s.type, CONCAT(COALESCE(CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ', '')), COALESCE(C.last_name, '')) AS creator, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(ow.first_name, ' ', ow.last_name), ', ') AS owners, STRING_AGG(CONCAT(cn.first_name, ' ', cn.last_name), ', ') AS contractors, s.reference, s.value, s.created, s.evaluated, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mod_comment mc WHERE mc.prv_object = s.id) AS comment_count FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction s LEFT JOIN prv_user c ON s.creator = c.id LEFT JOIN mod_redistribution r ON s.id = r.parent LEFT JOIN prv_user ow ON r.user = ow.id AND r.type = 'O' LEFT JOIN prv_user cn ON r.user = cn.id AND r.type = 'C' GROUP BY s.id, s.type, c.first_name, c.last_name, ow.first_name, ow.last_name, cn.first_name, cn.last_name, s.reference, s.value, s.created, s.evaluated;

changeSet.author: settler
changeSet.createView: SELECT s.id, s.type, CONCAT(IF(ISNULL( C.first_name), '', CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ')), IF(ISNULL( C.last_name), '', c.last_name)) AS creator, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(ow.first_name, ' ', ow.last_name) SEPARATOR ', ') AS owners, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(cn.first_name, ' ', cn.last_name) SEPARATOR ', ') AS contractors, s.reference, s.value, s.created, s.confirmed, s.evaluated, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mod_comment mc WHERE mc.prv_object = s.id) AS comment_count FROM mod_transaction s LEFT JOIN prv_user c ON s.creator = c.id LEFT JOIN mod_redistribution r ON s.id = r.parent LEFT JOIN prv_user ow ON r.user = ow.id AND r.type = 'O' LEFT JOIN prv_user cn ON r.user = cn.id AND r.type = 'C' GROUP BY s.id;
